name: jetstream
description: An open source repository for the JetStream benchmark.

scripts.format:check: npm run pretty:check && npm run lint:check
scripts.test:chrome: npm run test:prepare && node tests/run-browser.mjs --browser chrome
scripts.test:firefox: npm run test:prepare && node tests/run-browser.mjs --browser firefox
scripts.test:safari: npm run test:prepare && node tests/run-browser.mjs --browser safari
scripts.test:edge: npm run test:prepare && node tests/run-browser.mjs --browser edge
scripts.test:shell: npm run test:prepare && npm run test:v8 && npm run test:jsc && npm run test:spidermonkey
scripts.test:v8: npm run test:prepare && node tests/run-shell.mjs --shell v8
scripts.test:jsc: npm run test:prepare && node tests/run-shell.mjs --shell jsc
scripts.test:spidermonkey: npm run test:prepare && node tests/run-shell.mjs --shell spidermonkey
